sect1.title: Messages
sect1.para: Given the sensitive nature of automatic source code processing, it is quite important to keep informed about what is going on during the formatting process. The default configuration should be sufficient for most users, so there should seldom arise the need to change anything here.

sect3.title: Categories
sect3.para: Jalopy provides different message categories for setting verbosity level. Changing the threshold from ERROR to DEBUG successively displays more (albeit not necessarily more useful) messages.
